column4: can anybody recommand me a MD5 check tools, as i downloaded xubuntu 9.10, i want to check it before burn to cd
jinroh,  oh mate of course in ubuntu
so i have to compare the result myself?
you compare it to the md5 on the site you down load from
i know , i mean  i need to compare it by my careful eyes?
you run md5sum and you paste the md5 from the site right below it

if you want to do it by not trusting your eyes... just put both into a doc editor and then do a find/replace on one of them and replace it with something like XX, if it matches, the whole thing will be changed to XX
thanks , i am lucky, it is valid
I am a fiddler... tinkerer, not that smart, just working with what I got :)
thanks anyway, you help me through
glad to assist, I am a noob and many have helped me here
